__e: Why not against Master Chief Sullivan and the others?
My son is gone, Miss Sullivan, and there is nothing I can do now but put his memory to rest and get on with the business of living.
Sullivan, the captain wants to see you in his office.
Mr. Sullivan, what was your daughter doing in that section of town?
Well, Mr. Sullivan, what have you got to say for yourself?
Which means it's not Sullivan's.It's the bad guy's.
Mr. Sullivan, it's so nice to see you.
Miss Sullivan, I find it difficult to talk through those glasses.
Sullivan's blood wasn't on the murder weapon.
And then, when you got there... you found out Billy Sullivan wasn't dead. You knew you'd lose it before you could move in.
Mr. Sullivan, there's very little I can do for you.
